collectible.title: Choker from Nagatoro-san
collectible.subtitle: It's just a choker, really!
collectible.text: Nagatoro gave you this fashionable choker as a consolation prize after she won. She said it would look great on you, It even has your name on it.
collectible.unlock: Lose a game to Nagatoro where she does not reveal her chest.

collectible.title: "Do Anything You Say" Ticket
collectible.subtitle: Anything, you say?
collectible.text: Nagatoro gave you this ticket for winning. You can redeem it to make her do anything you say! Maybe it will come in handy one day...

collectible.title: Nagatoro's Handkerchief
collectible.subtitle: It's a bit sticky.
collectible.text: Nagatoro gave you her handkerchief to wipe yourself off with after you both lost. She didn't say you could keep it, but she might not want it back now...
collectible.unlock: Lose a game against Nagatoro where she at least shows her chest to you.

collectible.title: Selfie from Nagatoro-san
collectible.subtitle: Don't open it in public!
collectible.text: Nagatoro felt bad for you, and wanted to give you some "inspiration" for later.
collectible.unlock: Win against Nagatoro in her default outfit while already having unlocked the "Do Anything You Say" ticket.
